data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the county of Nanchong, Sichuan, China that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Nanchong, Sichuan, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Nanchong, Sichuan, China a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 576,544 believers find a person of peace today among the 7,023,455 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 7,600,000 citizens of Nanchong, Sichuan, China, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Nosu, Shengzha people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Lord, make the 576,544 believers in Nanchong to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 7,023,455 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Nanchong.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Nanchong, Sichuan, China humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

location.name: Nanchong
location.people_groups_list: Ersu, Naxi, Naruo, Nosu, Yinuo, Naru
